item.description:
UPDATE:

Hi All,

As they say, the show must go on !! As of 6:15 they are still having it, and who cares if we get a little wet. Might be fun !

Since we have big numbers, if it is canceled, we will do something else, so call me at 203-987-8168 to see where we are.

Steve C.



Location: Edgerton Park
75 Cliff St.
New Haven, CT 06520
Date(s): August 19-22, 24-29, 31-Sept. 5, 2010
Time(s): 8 p.m.
Category: Performing Art
Description: The Elm Shakespeare Company presents William Shakespeare's "The Winter Tale."

Admission: Free with suggested donations: adults $20, students $10, children (12 and under) $5..

Phone: (203) 393-1436

To go to their web site click here.

I am shutting down the replys a day before so that I can get an accurate count. This count is important, so please cancel your response if you can't make it.

When you get there, call my temporary phone at 203-987-8168 to find where we are.

Thanks,

Steve C.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: William Shakespeare's- THE WINTER'S TALE UPDATED
